author: desruisseaux
msg: Remove the CHANGES file because not unmaintained. This file still exists on the branches and tags prior to SIS 0.4.
Update the copyright year in the README file.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Added a warning in javadoc of contains(Envelope, boolean) and intersects(Envelope, boolean) methods
that their API may change (see SIS-172 for this issue). Users are advised to use contains(Envelope)
and intersects(Envelope) instead for API stability.
